title: Product Hunt Scraper - High-Performance Data Extraction Actor

cycle.title: Data Cycle
cycle.description: Data Cycle, For example: day, week, month, year

week.title: Week
week.description: Week of year, You need to enter date, and the year will be taken. range: 1-52, For example: 1

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: The maximum quantity obtained, the larger the quantity, the longer the time
